tool_description: This API helps to query rooms, price, facilities, policities, etc information from many hotels around the world to create a travelling site/application, such as : hotels.com
name: Hotels
title: Hotels

api_list.name: reviews/list (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get all reviews of specific property

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field that received from .../properties/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: loc
optional_parameters.description: The language code

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

api_list.name: reviews/v2/list (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get all reviews of specific property

required_parameters.name: hotelId
required_parameters.description: The value of id field that received from …/properties/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: reviewOrder
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : rating_highest_first|rating_lowest_first|date_newest_first

optional_parameters.name: paginationURL
optional_parameters.description: The value of nextURL field returned right in this endpoint, used to load next page.

optional_parameters.name: tripTypeFilter
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : all|romance|family|with-friends|other

api_list.name: properties/get-details (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get all available information of a property

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field that returned in properties/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: children6
optional_parameters.description: The age of every children separated by comma in the sixth room

optional_parameters.name: children1
optional_parameters.description: The age of every children separated by comma in the first room. Ex : 5,11

optional_parameters.name: adults3
optional_parameters.description: The number of adults in the third room

api_list.name: properties/list (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List properties with options and filters

required_parameters.name: checkOut
required_parameters.description: The check-out date at hotel, formated as yyyy-MM-dd

required_parameters.name: destinationId
required_parameters.description: The value of destinationId returned in locations/search endpoint

required_parameters.name: pageNumber
required_parameters.description: The page number in which data is display

required_parameters.name: checkIn
required_parameters.description: The check-in date at hotel, formated as yyyy-MM-dd

required_parameters.name: adults1
required_parameters.description: The number of adults in first room

required_parameters.name: pageSize
required_parameters.description: Total items returned in every requests (max 25)

optional_parameters.name: accommodationIds
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable value (separated by comma to specify multiple values) in accommodationType field returned right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: guestRatingMin
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable min rating in filters/guestRating/range/min field returned right in this endpoint. Please use integer value.

optional_parameters.name: children4
optional_parameters.description: The age of every children separated by comma in the fourth room

optional_parameters.name: children8
optional_parameters.description: The age of every children separated by comma in the eighth room

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: The language code, get all supported language code from .../get-meta-data endpoint

optional_parameters.name: priceMin
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable min price in filters/price/range/min field returned right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: priceMax
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable max price in filters/price/range/max field returned right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: adults8
optional_parameters.description: The number of adults in the eighth room

optional_parameters.name: adults6
optional_parameters.description: The number of adults in the sixth room

optional_parameters.name: adults4
optional_parameters.description: The number of adults in the fourth room

optional_parameters.name: starRatings
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable value (separated by comma to specify multiple values) in starRating returned right in this endpoint. Ex : 2,3

optional_parameters.name: sortOrder
optional_parameters.description: One of the following is allowed BEST_SELLER|STAR_RATING_HIGHEST_FIRST|STAR_RATING_LOWEST_FIRST|DISTANCE_FROM_LANDMARK|GUEST_RATING|PRICE_HIGHEST_FIRST|PRICE

optional_parameters.name: children2
optional_parameters.description: The age of every children separated by comma in the second room

optional_parameters.name: adults2
optional_parameters.description: The number of adults in the second room

optional_parameters.name: adults3
optional_parameters.description: The number of adults in the third room

optional_parameters.name: adults5
optional_parameters.description: The number of adults in the fifth room

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The currency code

optional_parameters.name: amenityIds
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable value (separated by comma to specify multiple values) in facilities field returned right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: children6
optional_parameters.description: The age of every children separated by comma in the sixth room

optional_parameters.name: children5
optional_parameters.description: The age of every children separated by comma in the fifth room

optional_parameters.name: children1
optional_parameters.description: The age of every children separated by comma in the first room. Ex : 5,11

optional_parameters.name: children3
optional_parameters.description: The age of every children separated by comma in the third room

optional_parameters.name: children7
optional_parameters.description: The age of every children separated by comma in the seventh room

optional_parameters.name: landmarkIds
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable value (separated by comma to specify multiple values) in landmarks field returned right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: themeIds
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable value (separated by comma to specify multiple values) in themesAndTypes field returned right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: adults7
optional_parameters.description: The number of adults in the seventh room

api_list.name: get-meta-data (Deprecated)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hotels4.p.rapidapi.com/get-meta-data"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hotels4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hotels4.p.rapidapi.com/get-meta-data"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hotels4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: locations/v2/search (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Search for related locations and suggestions

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Name of countries, cities, districts, places, etc...

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: The language code

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The currency code

api_list.name: properties/get-hotel-photos (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get all available photos of property

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field that received from .../properties/list endpoint

api_list.name: properties/v2/resolve-url
api_list.description: Hotels system is being merged with Expedia. This endpoint helps to convert the old hotel ID (embedded in the shared link, Ex : "ho133528" in hotels.com/ho133528/) to the new one (423818).

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id (started with ho...) extracted from the shared link. Ex : 'ho546370' from https://www.hoteles.com/ho546370

optional_parameters.name: siteid
optional_parameters.description: The value of siteId field returned in …/v2/get-meta-data endpoint

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: The language code

optional_parameters.name: langid
optional_parameters.description: The value of languageIdentifier field returned in …/v2/get-meta-data endpoint

api_list.name: v2/get-meta-data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hotels4.p.rapidapi.com/v2/get-meta-data"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hotels4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hotels4.p.rapidapi.com/v2/get-meta-data"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hotels4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
